text: Hello little guy, Welcome to the world.  Your mom and dad are teachers and learners. I wonder what kind of learner you will beâ€¦ â€¦ just like your parents do. We look forward to finding out! Love from Your excited grandparents.
Congratulations, Edna! Beautiful boy! I am sure he will be all of that and more!

Congratulations! We got one of those ( but a pink one) recently & she is SO scrumptious!

Very special Ed. Congrats to all of you. He is very cute! We miss you at school.
